div.p: AUTHOR ROLE is a field in the Bibliography Database which describes an individual's involvement in a work. If the person entered in the STANDARDNAME field is the sole author of the work being cited, leave this field at its default, or blank, setting.

Author Role has several possible options:
Editor
Translator
Compiler
Adaptor
Contributor
Illustrator
Introduction
Revised If you are entering a bibrecord for an introduction or preface, this should be entered as an analytic title within the book (part) workform. Do not choose "introd" in the AUTHORROLE field; it will be redundant because the name will appear as author of the "Introduction."
